name: StudyNotion
description: StudyNotion is a comprehensive ed-tech platform built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS). It empowers users to create, consume, and rate educational content, providing an engaging and accessible learning experience for students. Instructors can showcase their expertise and connect with learners worldwide. StudyNotion aims to make education more interactive and inclusive, enhancing the overall learning experience. This platform integrates advanced technologies to deliver seamless functionality and foster a global educational community. In the following sections, we will delve into the technical aspects of StudyNotion.

name: Online Code Compiler
description: Coding platform built for colleges and education, supporting multiple languages, real-time code saving, and interactive consoles for students.

name: Ecommerce Website
description: Ecommerce marketplace with admin panel for selling products and managing orders. Built with React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, and Stripe. Admin panel includes product management, order management, and inventory management.
